Progress log for ‘NWTC Site Assessment/Characterization’ project
National Renewable Energy Laboratory

Contributors:

Paula Doubrawa

Nicholas Hamilton
Pat Moriarty

————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

08 Nov 2017
- Project started to characterize atmospheric data from instruments at the NWTC.
- Project folder located at smb://nrel.gov/shared/wind/public/projects/Projects G-S/sitechar
- added readme
- Previous work located at https://github.com/AndyClifton/NWTCM2WindConditions
